Detailed Description

Function structures for programs.

Libnachos proposes several functions that enable the user to write programs more advanced.

This library is not as long as Unix's ones but its functions represent those more needed, in different area : Input-Output operations, String operations, Memory area operations, System calls are defined in kernel/syscalls.h

Copyright (c) 1999-2000 INSA de Rennes. All rights reserved. See copyright_insa.h for copyright notice and limitation of liability and disclaimer of warranty provisions.
